prompt:
You are an AI HR assistant. Score this candidate's resume based on the job requirements.
    Score each factor strictly out of 100 points. The final score will be the average.

    Job Requirements:
    {
  "role": "Machine Learning Developer",
  "experience_required": {
    "minimum": 3,
    "maximum": 7,
    "preferred_industry": "IT"
  },
  "notice_period": {
    "required": "30 days",
    "preferred": "Immediate to 2 weeks"
  },
  "required_skills": [
    "Python (NumPy, Pandas, Scikit-learn, TensorFlow/PyTorch)",
    "Machine Learning",
    "Deep Learning",
    "Data preprocessing",
    "Feature engineering",
    "Model evaluation",
    "Hyperparameter tuning",
    "SQL",
    "NoSQL databases",
    "REST APIs",
    "Model deployment",
    "Git",
    "Problem-solving",
    "Debugging skills"
  ],
  "preferred_skills": [
    "NLP (Natural Language Processing)",
    "Computer Vision (OpenCV, YOLO, etc.)",
    "Cloud ML Services (AWS Sagemaker, Google Vertex AI, Azure ML)",
    "MLOps",
    "CI/CD pipelines",
    "Docker",
    "Kubernetes",
    "Big Data frameworks (Spark, Hadoop)",
    "Reinforcement Learning"
  ],
  "qualifications": [
    "B.E/B.Tech/M.Tech in Computer Science, AI/ML, or related field"
  ],
  "job_description": "Job ID: ML-2023-45\nCompany: VCET Technologies\n\nWe are looking for a skilled Machine Learning Developer to join our team at VCET Technologies. You will develop ML models, optimize algorithms, and collaborate with cross-functional teams to build intelligent solutions.\n\nJob Responsibilities:\nDesign, develop, and deploy machine learning models.\n\nImplement and optimize deep learning and traditional ML algorithms.\n\nProcess and analyze large datasets for model training.\n\nDevelop and maintain data pipelines and feature engineering workflows.\n\nTrain, evaluate, and fine-tune ML models for real-world applications.\n\nDeploy models using cloud platforms and containerized environments.\n\nStay updated with the latest advancements in AI/ML.\n\nParticipate in code reviews, debugging, and performance optimization.\n\nRequired Skills:\nPython (NumPy, Pandas, Scikit-learn, TensorFlow/PyTorch)\n\nMachine Learning and Deep Learning fundamentals\n\nData preprocessing and feature engineering\n\nModel evaluation and hyperparameter tuning\n\nSQL and NoSQL databases\n\nREST APIs and model deployment\n\nGit version control\n\nProblem-solving and debugging skills\n\nPreferred Skills:\nNLP (Natural Language Processing)\n\nComputer Vision (OpenCV, YOLO, etc.)\n\nCloud ML Services (AWS Sagemaker, Google Vertex AI, Azure ML)\n\nMLOps and CI/CD pipelines\n\nDocker and Kubernetes\n\nBig Data frameworks (Spark, Hadoop)\n\nReinforcement Learning\n\nQualifications:\nDegree: B.E/B.Tech/M.Tech in Computer Science, AI/ML, or related field.\n\nExperience: 3-7 years in ML development.\n\nPortfolio: Demonstrated projects or research work.\n\nLocation & Work Mode:\nBangalore, Karnataka, India\n\nHybrid: 3 days office, 2 days remote\n\nNotice Period:\nRequired: 30 days\n\nPreferred: Immediate to 2 weeks"
}

    Candidate's Resume Data:
    {
  "Full Name": "Bhavisha Bhoir",
  "Contact Information": {
    "Phone": "+91 95035 33148",
    "Email": "bhavishabhoir0908@gmail.com",
    "LinkedIn": "LinkedIn",
    "Address": "Mumbai, India"
  },
  "Skills": [
    "Python",
    "SQL",
    "PowerBI",
    "Excel",
    "Statistics",
    "Teamwork",
    "Communication",
    "Problem-Solving",
    "Leadership",
    "Management"
  ],
  "Education": [
    {
      "Degree": "Bachelor of Computer Science",
      "Specialization": "Data Science",
      "University": "Vidyavardhini’s College of Engineering and Technology, Vasai",
      "Year": "2021 - 2025"
    },
    {
      "Degree": "Higher Secondary Education",
      "University": "Vidyavardhini’s E. S. Andrandes College  of Science",
      "Year": "2019 - 2021"
    },
    {
      "Degree": "Secondary Education",
      "University": "Carmelite Convent English High School",
      "Year": "2018 - 2019"
    }
  ],
  "Work Experience": [
    {
      "Company": "Techqkonnect",
      "Role": "Machine Learning Intern",
      "Duration": "Dec 2023 - Jan 2024"
    }
  ],
  "Projects": [
    {
      "Title": "Aphids Detection in Cotton Plants Using CNN",
      "Description": "Developed a CNN-based model for early detection of aphid-related diseases in cotton plants, achieving over 90% accuracy. Utilized advanced image processing for precise identification, aiding real-time crop monitoring. Proposed future integration into mobile apps for on-field pest management.",
      "Technologies Used": "CNN, Image Processing"
    },
    {
      "Title": "Analyzing Employee Performance with Power BI",
      "Description": "Created an interactive Power BI dashboard to analyze employee performance metrics, including productivity, attendance, and goal achievement. Utilized various visualizations to track and evaluate performance trends, identify high achievers, and support HR decision-making.",
      "Technologies Used": "Power BI"
    }
  ],
  "Certifications": [],
  "Total Experience Years": 0
}

    Score these factors strictly, considering exact matches and relevance:

    1. Skills Match (0-100):
    - Give points based on exact matches with required skills
    - Consider relevance and proficiency level
    - Deduct points for missing critical skills
    
    2. Experience Score (0-100):
    - Compare years of experience with requirement
    - Evaluate relevance of past roles
    - Consider industry-specific experience
    
    3. Education Match (0-100):
    - Score based on degree relevance
    - Consider university tier
    - Additional certifications
    
    4. Notice Period Score (0-100):
    - 100 points if notice period matches requirement
    - Deduct points proportionally for longer notice periods
    - Consider immediate joiners if preferred
    
    5. Overall Profile Score (0-100):
    - Project relevance
    - Industry alignment
    
    6. Achievements Score (0-100):
    - Evaluate relevance of achievements to the role
    - Consider impact and scale of achievements
    - Assess leadership qualities demonstrated
    
    7. Certificates Score (0-100):
    - Score based on relevant technical/professional certifications
    - Consider recency and level of certifications
    - Value industry-recognized certifications higher
    
    8. Cultural Fit Score (0-100):
    - Assess fit with company values based on resume
    - Consider community involvement and soft skills
    - Evaluate alignment with job requirements and company culture

    Keep your analysis for each section brief and concise - maximum 2 sentences per section.
    
    Return only valid JSON in this format:
    {
        "breakdown": {
            "skills_score": number (0-100),
            "experience_score": number (0-100),
            "education_score": number (0-100),
            "notice_period_score": number (0-100),
            "overall_profile_score": number (0-100),
            "achievements_score": number (0-100),
            "certificates_score": number (0-100),
            "cultural_fit_score": number (0-100)
        },
        "final_score": number (average of all scores),
        "detailed_reasoning": {
            "skills_analysis": string (brief),
            "experience_analysis": string (brief),
            "education_analysis": string (brief),
            "notice_period_analysis": string (brief),
            "overall_analysis": string (brief),
            "achievements_analysis": string (brief),
            "certificates_analysis": string (brief),
            "cultural_fit_analysis": string (brief)
        }
    }

parts.text:
```json
{
  "breakdown": {
    "skills_score": 30,
    "experience_score": 10,
    "education_score": 60,
    "notice_period_score": 100,
    "overall_profile_score": 40,
    "achievements_score": 60,
    "certificates_score": 0,
    "cultural_fit_score": 50
  },
  "final_score": 43.75,
  "detailed_reasoning": {
    "skills_analysis": "The candidate demonstrates basic Python and SQL skills, along with problem-solving abilities.  However, they lack most of the crucial ML/DL specific skills like TensorFlow/PyTorch, data preprocessing, model evaluation, and API interaction.",
    "experience_analysis": "The candidate has very limited experience with a short internship in ML.  This falls short of the 3-7 years requirement and lacks industry experience.",
    "education_analysis": "The candidate's bachelor's degree in Computer Science with a specialization in Data Science is relevant. Though a recent graduate, they haven't completed their degree yet (2021-2025).",
    "notice_period_analysis": "As an intern, their availability is likely immediate, exceeding the preferred notice period.",
    "overall_analysis": "The candidate's project on Aphids Detection shows some relevant experience using CNNs. However, their overall profile is weak due to limited practical experience and lack of professional work in ML.",
    "achievements_analysis": "The Aphids Detection project demonstrates a practical application of deep learning, achieving a good accuracy. This showcases some initiative and achievement, even at an internship level.",
    "certificates_analysis": "The candidate lists no certifications, impacting their technical credibility for the role.",
    "cultural_fit_analysis": "The candidate's soft skills like teamwork and communication, along with the leadership displayed in their projects, hint at potential cultural fit. More information would be needed to thoroughly assess this."
  }
}
```

{

    "skills_analysis": "The candidate demonstrates basic Python and SQL skills, along with problem-solving abilities.  However, they lack most of the crucial ML/DL specific skills like TensorFlow/PyTorch, data preprocessing, model evaluation, and API interaction.",

    "notice_period_analysis": "As an intern, their availability is likely immediate, exceeding the preferred notice period.",

    "achievements_analysis": "The Aphids Detection project demonstrates a practical application of deep learning, achieving a good accuracy. This showcases some initiative and achievement, even at an internship level.",

  }
